# Review and visualization applications

## Assessment review tools

### Pre-assessment site validation applications

To run locallyor in R-Studio Cloud:
```{r, eval=F}
irTools::runSiteValApp()
```

To run remotely:
[Site review application](https://udwq.shinyapps.io/site-review-demo/){target="_blank"}
[![site-val-app](99-other-files/images/site-val-app.PNG)](https://udwq.shinyapps.io/site-review-demo/){target="_blank"}


### Assessment & data dashboard
To run locally or in R-Studio Cloud:
```{r, eval=F}
irTools::asmntDashboard()
```
To run remotely:
[udwq.shinyapps.io/asmntDashboard](https://udwq.shinyapps.io/asmntDashboard/){target="_blank"}
[![asmntDashboard](99-other-files/images/asmntDashboard.PNG)](https://udwq.shinyapps.io/asmntDashboard/){target="_blank"}
